jackMarshal.name: 'Jack Marshal
jackMarshal.rules: This model is a 'jack marshal and can command warjacks.

advanceDeployment.name: Advance Deployment
advanceDeployment.rules: In most scenarios, this model can be deployed after normal deployment, up to 3" beyond the established deployment zone.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.rules: In most scenarios, this model does not have to be deployed at the start of the game. Instead, it can be placed at the end of any of your Control Phases after the first round.

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.rules: This model treats shallow water as open terrain while advancing. While completely in shallow water, this model gains concealment and does not block line of sight.

arcNode.name: Arc Node
arcNode.rules: This warjack is a channeler equipped with an arc node and can act as a conduit for spells cast by its warcaster.

assault.name: Assault
assault.rules: This model can make an assault ranged attack.

cavalry.name: Cavalry
cavalry.rules: This model is a cavalry model.

combinedMeleeAttack.name: Combined Melee Attack
combinedMeleeAttack.rules: This model can participate in combined melee attacks with other models in its unit.

combinedRangedAttack.name: Combined Ranged Attack
combinedRangedAttack.rules: This model can participate in combined ranged attacks with other models in its unit.

construct.name: Construct
construct.rules: This model is a construct and is not a living model.

dualAttack.name: Dual Attack
dualAttack.rules: This model can make melee and ranged attacks in the same activation. This model cannot make ranged attacks after making a power attack.

eyelessSight.name: Eyeless Sight
eyelessSight.rules: This model ignores cloud effects when determining line of sight. This model ignores concealment and {advantage:stealth} and never suffers Blind.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.rules: This model gains +2 on power attack damage rolls and on power attack collateral damage rolls.

headbuttPowerAttack.name: Headbutt Power Attack
headbuttPowerAttack.rules: This model can make Headbutt power attacks.

incorporeal.name: Incorporeal
incorporeal.rules: This model roams the battlefield in spectral form.

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.rules: This model treats rough terrain as open terrain while advancing. While charging, slam power attacking, or trample power attacking, this model does not stop its movement when it contacts an obstacle.

resistanceElectricity.name: Resistance: Electricity
resistanceElectricity.rules: When this model suffers an electrical damage roll, remove one die from the damage roll. Additionally, when lightning arcs as a result of a special rule, ignore models with Resistance: Electricity when determining which model the lightning arcs to. Lightning cannot arc from a model with Resistance: Electricity.

slamPowerAttack.name: Slam Power Attack
slamPowerAttack.rules: This model can make Slam power attacks.

soulless.name: Soulless
soulless.rules: This living model does not generate a soul token when it is destroyed.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.rules: Ranged and arcane attacks targeting this model from a point of origin greater than 5" away automatically miss. This model is not an intervening model when determining line of sight from a model more than 5" away.

tough.name: Tough
tough.rules: When this model is disabled, roll a d6. On a 5 or 6, remove 1 damage point from this model; it is no longer disabled and becomes knocked down. While knocked down, this model loses Tough.

undead.name: Undead
undead.rules: This model is an undead model and not a living model.

unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
unstoppable.rules: This model does not have to forfeit its Combat Action when it advances or is placed out of one or more enemy models' melee ranged during its Normal Movement (see Disengaging).
